intro: Take control of a young teacher's destiny! Each decision will influence her relationships and lead her to discover unique endings. Which will you choose?
description:
Meet a young English teacher who, despite facing difficult situations with some students, struggles to maintain her professionalism.

In this experience, every decision you make will affect the relationships and events within the classroom.

Will you choose a firm and ethical path, or will you let your emotions get the better of you? Every decision counts and every ending will be unique!

With multiple outcomes depending on your choices, invites you to discover fascinating possibilities - make your story unforgettable!
